Description.Text: Situated in Yenikapi in the old peninsula of Istanbul, the family-friendly Hotel Kanada promises an ideal location within walking distance of numerous historical attractions and cultural treasures including Hagia Sophia, Byzantine Hippodrome, Grand Bazaar, Basilica Cistern and the Blue Mosque. In addition, the hotel is a stoneâs throw from an array of public transport links which provide easy access throughout one of the liveliest cities in the world, where guests can also discover a plethora of markets, shopping venues, restaurants, clubs and taverns. Despite being close to major tourist sites, the charming hotel is a peaceful retreat from the cityâs noisy streets, offering a restaurant which serves a buffet breakfast and delicious Turkish cuisine throughout the day, as well as a cozy bar where both friends and family can enjoy cocktails, refreshing beverages and tasty snacks after a long day of exploration. In addition, complimentary wireless internet access is available in all public areas and guestrooms, allowing guests to stay connected with the outside world. Standard rooms boast comfortable furnishings and basic modern amenities tailored to the needs of modern travelers, including a satellite LCD television and a minibar, to guarantee a pleasant stay.
